title: Pictures are forthcoming... seriously
body: I'll have new pictures up very soon. Everytime I think I'm ready to post them, something new happens... something that I absolutely MUST document on film. All the chairs will be in tomorrow, and the digital projector might even be working late tomorrow evening. See what I mean! Too much stuff to document!
author: Dan

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: A projector?! A screen?! Holy crap!  That's a theater!

comments.author: erin
comments.body: (that wasnt sarcastic. i read it and now it just looks sarcastic. but its not!)

comments.author: Steve Kirks
comments.body:
weblog meet up right now, Patton Alley Pub!

We'll be here until 9PM-ish
